channel.title: Owner construction in game permenent?
channel.description: Is there a way to make it so when an owner builds soemthing with con it gets somehow put in to the client permenatly? Like say i build a wall some where in the game and im the owner is there a way to keep that wall there for ever?...(ill try anything to avoid scripting) =)
